Title: Requires cytomegalovirus screening for every newborn
Summary: Requires cytomegalovirus screening for every newborn by administration of a dried blood spot or a urine polymerase chain reaction (PCR) test.
LawCode: Amd ยง2500-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring cytomegalovirus screening for every newborn
